If you have questions pertaining to your students assignments you can ask the student’s teacher by email.

If you have questions or issues with the chromebook (i.e. won’t turn on, camera doesn’t work, etc.), please email BESD53-COVID19-CHROMEBOOKS@BESD53.ORG. Pending any further changes, we should have Technology staff available via email during school hours (8 a.m. - 3:30 p.m.).
